name: Carnophobia, Level 2
description:
Carnophobia is a collaborative student project. Each student was tasked with creating a level layout and given specific design constraints to follow. It was created with the intent to showcase level design, scripted events and asset sourcing skills (with a few inside jokes sprinkled throughout!)

Explore the eeriness of outer space deep in the confines of an isolated space station. Remember to hide from foes to get to the last escape pod, or experience the living horrors of the unknown...
